title: The Graduate
description: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

title: In the Heat of the Night
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

title: Bonnie and Clyde
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

title: Cool Hand Luke
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

title: The Dirty Dozen
description: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass-assassination mission of German officers.

title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
description: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.

title: Wait Until Dark
description: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.

title: Le Samouraï
description: After a professional hitman is seen by witnesses, his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

title: Belle de Jour
description: A beautiful young housewife, bored with her marriage, finds release by working during the week at a brothel.

title: Playtime
description: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists.

title: The Jungle Book
description: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

title: In Cold Blood
description: After a botched robbery results in the brutal murder of a rural family, two drifters elude police, in the end coming to terms with their own mortality and the repercussions of their vile atrocity.

title: Point Blank
description: After being double-crossed and left for dead, a mysterious crook named Walker single-mindedly tries to retrieve the money that was stolen from him.

title: You Only Live Twice
description: James Bond and the Japanese Secret Service must find and stop the true culprit of a series of space hijackings, before war is provoked between Russia and the United States.

title: Barefoot in the Park
description: Conservative young lawyer Paul Bratter marries the vivacious Corie. Their highly passionate relationship descends into comical discord in a five-flight New York City walk-up apartment.

title: To Sir, with Love
description: Idealistic engineer-trainee and his experiences in teaching a group of rambunctious white high school students from the slums of London's East End.

title: Camelot
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of Music, Adaptation or Treatment
description: The story of the marriage of King Arthur to Guinevere. The plot of illegitimate Mordred to gain the throne and Guinevere's growing attachment to Sir Lancelot, threaten to topple the Round Table.

title: Doctor Dolittle
description: A doctor turns from treating people to treating animals and can speak their language.

title: Two for the Road
description: A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of infidelity in their troubled ten-year marriage.

title: The Fearless Vampire Killers
description: A dedicated professor and his timid assistant arrive in Transylvania to destroy the vampires and rescue a beautiful damsel in distress.

title: Bedazzled
description: A hopeless young man sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for seven wishes, but trouble ensues when each wish goes wrong.

title: Far from the Madding Crowd
description: Bathsheba Everdene, a willful, flirtatious, young woman, unexpectedly inherits a large farm and is romantically pursued by three very different men.

title: The Young Girls of Rochefort
description: Two sisters leave their small seaside town of Rochefort in search of romance. Hired as carnival singers, one falls for an American musician, while the other searches for her ideal partner.

title: Weekend
description: A surreal tale of a married couple going on a road trip to visit the wife's parents with the intention of killing them for the inheritance.

title: Samurai Rebellion
description: The mother of a feudal lord's only heir is kidnapped away from her husband by the lord. The husband and his samurai father must decide whether to accept the unjust decision, or risk death to get her back.

title: Marketa Lazarová
description: In the middle ages, a daughter of a feudal lord is kidnapped by neighbouring robber knights and becomes the mistress of one of them.

title: The Firemen's Ball
description: A volunteer fire department throws a party for their dying ex-boss, but everything goes wrong.

title: Mouchette
description: A young girl living in the French countryside lives a life of abject misery with her dying mother and alcoholic father.

title: Branded to Kill
description: A yakuza hitman ranked as the No. 3 killer in the Japanese underworld, takes a job and soon finds himself the target of the No. 1 killer.

title: Dragon Inn
description: The children of an executed general are pursued by the secret police but are aided by a group of heroic martial artists.

title: A Colt Is My Passport
description: A hitman and his partner are hired to take out a mob boss, but soon find themselves betrayed and on the run.

title: Viy
description: A young seminary student is forced to spend three nights praying over the corpse of a witch who died after he beat her.

title: Hombre
description: John Russell, a white man raised by Apaches, faces prejudice from the passengers of a stagecoach until they are robbed and he becomes their only hope for survival.

title: Reflections in a Golden Eye
description: A repressed homosexual Army officer, his unsatisfied wife, and a private become involved in a tragedy of desire and jealousy on a Southern army base.

title: Up the Down Staircase
description: A new teacher at an inner-city high school struggles to connect with her students while battling the school's bureaucracy.

title: The Whisperers
description: An elderly, poor, eccentric woman living in a ground floor flat imagines that she is being spied on by people in the flat upstairs.

title: Divorce American Style
description: After 17 years, a suburban couple drifts toward divorce, then finds that the split is not as easy or liberating as they expected.

title: Thoroughly Modern Millie
description: An innocent small-town girl comes to the big city in search of a husband and becomes involved in a white slavery ring.

title: The Taming of the Shrew
description: Brutish, fortune-hunting Petruchio tames his wealthy, shrewish wife, Katharina.

title: Quatermass and the Pit
description: A mysterious artifact is unearthed in London, and famous scientist Bernard Quatermass is called in to divine its origins and explain the strange effects on people.

title: Frankenstein Created Woman
description: After being reanimated, Baron Frankenstein transfers the soul of an executed young man into the body of his lover, prompting her to kill the men who wronged them.

title: The Sorcerers
description: An elderly couple invent a mind control device and use it to control a young man to experience new thrills.

title: Don't Look Back
description: Documentary covering Bob Dylan's 1965 tour of England, capturing the atmosphere of his concerts and his interactions with fans and the press.

title: Titicut Follies
description: A stark and graphic documentary exposing the conditions at the Massachusetts Correctional Institution at Bridgewater for the criminally insane.

title: La Chinoise
description: A small group of French students are studying Mao, trying to find out their position in the world and how to change the world to a Maoist community using terrorism.

title: The Stranger
description: Arthur Meursault, a French man living in Algiers during the 1930s, is seemingly indifferent to everything, from his mother's death to killing an Arab man on the beach.

title: Oedipus Rex
description: In pre-war Italy, a young couple have a baby boy. The father, motivated by jealousy, takes the baby into the desert to be abandoned.

title: I Am Curious (Yellow)
description: A young woman explores her sexuality and social conscience in 1960s Sweden.

title: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying
description: A window washer finds a book on how to get ahead in the business world and follows its advice to the letter.

title: The President's Analyst
description: A psychiatrist is selected to treat the President of the United States, but the stress of the job makes him paranoid and he runs away.

title: The War Wagon
description: A cowboy joins forces with an Indian to steal a gold shipment from a man who framed him years earlier.

title: The Incident
description: Two young hoodlums terrorize the passengers of a New York City subway train.
